https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vWY4KKjUPx6pZj54x3tZOOoihSA.jpg Bombing case at Nichiuri TV in autumn. The Satsuki Cup, which crowns the winner of Japan's Hyakunin Isshu, is currently being filmed inside the facility. The incident results in a big commotion and, while the building is burning to ashes, the only people left inside are Hattori and Toyama Kazuha. They get rescued just in time by Conan , who rushes to the scene. Both the identity and purposes of the bomber are unknown. Detective Conan: The Crimson Love Letter
